name: Illuyanka: A Hittite Story
summary:
Illuyanka: A Hittite Story is an epic interactive journey set in the ancient world of the Hittites, where you can step into the roles of three powerful figures: Taru, the vengeful Storm God; Inara, his resourceful daughter; or Illuyanka, the mighty serpent. Each choice leads to a unique perspective on this timeless myth, filled with emotional depth, cultural richness, and intense conflict.

As Taru, you seek to reclaim your honor by vanquishing your old foe, Illuyanka, despite being blinded by rage and driven by the need for revenge. As Inara, you balance loyalty to your father with your own desires, weaving a plan that could either save your people or tear your heart apart. And as Illuyanka, you stand as the embodiment of raw, untamed nature, struggling to maintain your hold against the gods.

Explore Hittite traditions, navigate divine politics, and experience the weight of decisions that shape both the human and divine realms. Will you restore balance to the land, or will chaos reign? The fate of Hatti is in your hands.

Your choices shall shape the tale, yet you may always return or begin anew, perchance adopting another guise. Enjoy your journey, for the very act of recounting these ancient stories binds you to the age-old tradition of the bards and priests who first gave them voice.

name: I'll Take You to Tomato Town
summary: A small game about completing your grocery list.

name: Illusion of Itehari
summary: Fantasy otome game for the Nintendo Switch.

name: I'll be Brave, Tomorrow
summary: A first-person narrative adventure game, telling the story of a sick child playing a 2D platformer. This game is in support of Great Ormond Street Hospital Charity!

name: I love the money
summary: Eight madmen crazy about money will be delivered to the island to take part in the show "I Love the Money." In a state of euphoria, they have to run around for their coins, getting wounds and injuries, while the viewers are having so much fun.

name: I Love Math
summary: Mastering math becomes fun-and-games as you travel back to the ancient worlds of Atlantis, Greece, Egypt and the Aztecs. The intelligent tracking system automatically responds to your child's progress by topic so kids move ahead when they excel and get extra practice when they need it. All the lessons and problems in I Love Math are based on core curriculum topics which means it matches what kids are learning in school. With over 250 topics I Love Math! covers 4 grade levels to target your child's individual problem areas. Plus, over 6,000 help pop-ups provide extra reinforcement!

name: I Love My Follower (Count)
summary:
You are an Eldritch horror, summoned to the human realm.

You’re soon to realize, however, that you have more in common with your followers than you thought - they, too, have a longing for The Void.

The Void in their case is, however, mostly something they call ‘y2k’ and ‘retro anime aesthetics’.
But oh well, every god needs clout.

Build your church, gain followers, give away miracles.

Romance your head priest. Or don't.

name: I Lost Someone
summary: The story of a father and son experiencing the ups and downs of life, and how they try to make the best of the twists and turns life puts them through

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad Deluxe Edition
summary:
Aimed at history fans, this bundle includes the base game with its Stalingrad career mode, two additional collector's aircraft, and three historical, hand-crafted campaigns that build upon each other to create the 45-scenario saga of the Stalingrad front - Blazing Steppe (11th IAP pilot on Yak-1 series 69 in August and September 1942), Fortress on the Volga (I./JG 52 Staffel commander on Bf 109 G-2 in September and October), and Ice Ring (505th ShAP pilot on IL-2 mod. 1942 in November and December).

In total, this bundle contains 18 player-controlled aircraft, a pilot career mode, individual scenario missions, and a mission generator on the large map of the Stalingrad region as it was in 1942 and three historical campaigns.

name: Illmatic Envelope Swamp + Radirgy Swag
summary: These are overwhelming, fully loaded shooting games. If you are a fan of Radirgy, Chaos Field, and Karasu you will love also the next burning hot burning game: Illmatic Envelope from Milestone!

name: Illusion Carnival
summary: A lost soul wanders through a pop-up book-like whimsical and eerie amusement park; experience fun levels, meet unique characters, escape spirit erosion, and uncover the secrets of the park… The charming yet dark Illusion Carnival begins.

name: Ilomilo: Autumn Tale
summary: Ilomilo's Autumn Tale DLC features 25 new levels to solve as the titular characters throughout beautifully crafted autumn scenery.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: 1946
summary:
Oleg Maddox’s world famous IL-2 Sturmovik series of flight simulators continues to expand. The latest offering, IL-2 1946, adds 36 new planes, four new gigantic maps, over a hundred new ground objects, and nearly 200 new campaign missions. This new opus also includes all of the previous Il-2 series content. What years ago began as a one-aircraft study sim is now an astonishing anthology, with a whopping 229 flyable aircraft and over 300 aircraft total! Not to mention that players will have the opportunity to get a first glance at the future of the series arriving next year: Storm of War Battle of Britain via exclusive bonus videos.

IL-2 1946 includes all of the original IL-2 series content: IL-2 Sturmovik: Forgotten Battles, Ace Expansion Pack, Pacific Fighters and alternate history campaigns of year 1946.

name: I Love Spelling!
summary: Building spelling skills becomes fun-and-games as you bop from planet to planet with your hilarious game-show host. An intelligent tracking system automatically adds misspelled words to your own personalized list, to give you extra practice where you need it most. With over 5,000 key words and 50 spelling-pattern word groups I Love Spelling! is based on core curriculum lessons, to match what kids learn in school. Words are divided into spelling lists that teach you the basics so you can apply it to almost any word in the English language.

name: Ill Natured
summary:
iLL nATURED is a game made in RPG Maker 2000 by locus, also known as iLL rEBEL.
Long ago, humanity discovered Venus's Bracelet, a ring of habitable planets. One of them, Allos, became a conflict zone as its native species, the Figinians, saw humans as a threat. The two races have been at war ever since. Flame and Melody escape from their native Torbexia, one of Allos's human slave colonies, in search of a new life—but they end up getting involved in the flames of a war that's beginning to unfold.

name: I'll Invaligate Your Aid: Foreaver
summary: An adventure game where the antagonist is a girl who doesn't want you to play. Puzzly QTEs, rogue cursors... Not even your controller is safe from her! Help the protagonist retrieve his item while she tries to stop you, the player! ♥♥♥

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Cliffs of Dover
summary: Join the Royal Air Force and Battle for Britain! Fly into the pivotal aerial battle for the skies of Britain. As a member of the British RAF, face off against the deadly German Luftwaffe and the Italian air forces.

name: Ilomilo Plus
summary:
ilomilo plus is the Windows 8 version of the XBLA title, ilomilo, beefed up with additional fun levels, two exciting new chapters and three new challenging cubes. ilomilo is a puzzle game where the player controls two fellows named ilo and milo. \

The two friends always seem to get separated from each other in the surrealistic and ever changing world they inhabit, and the goal of each level is to reunite them. ilomilo presents puzzles where the player will have to use a great deal of three dimensional thinking to succeed. The world of ilomilo is made of cubes, and ilo and milo can walk any side of the cubes, as well as move cubes around.

The player controls both ilo and milo, and will have to make them cooperate to unite them. ilomilo also allows players to control one character each, and play through the game cooperatively

name: IlhaZ
summary: IlhaZ is an online survival game set in a post-apocalyptic archipelago. Survive against zombies, hunger, and harsh weather while interacting with other players in a brutal open world.

name: Illness
summary: Traditional Yume Nikki fangame, its gameplay is centered on the exploration of a Origamitsuki's dreams. It's unique characteristics are the existence of several effects on the same maps and its hallmark zoomorphic panoramas.

name: Iluminatus Bizarre Ascent
summary: Jump and survive! Help Iluminatus escape a bizarre world full of mutant viruses, creepy llamas, aliens, and powerful bosses! Unlock abilities, climb puzzling levels, or test your skills in endless mode.

name: Illusion of Being: Chapter 1
summary: Illusion of Being is an adult visual novel that brings an emotional, story driven experience to the genre that hasn’t been explored before. A cinematic audio / visual style takes immersion to the next level. Guide the main character through a life shattering chain of events with multiple endings.

name: Illang
summary: Illang is a free-to-play multiplayer social deduction game where players help the villagers of Koji Village find the sneaky Illang who has been wreaking havoc! From the creators of Second Wave comes a brand new adventure for players! Play with up to 20 players and work together to stop the Illang, but be warned, even your closest ally may turn out to be the very wolf in sheep's clothing you're looking for.

name: Ill
summary: Unleash your survival instincts. Step into the sinister town, face a growing horror and uncover the unsettling truth behind the town's descent into madness. Are you ready to confront your deepest fears?

name: Illumizzle: Finding the Lost Light
summary: illumizzle: Finding the lost light is a single-player puzzle adventure game. The main characters, Raco and Vera, live in a village in a virtual world where there is no natural light. Help them solve puzzles to finish their adventure of repairing their broken sun!

name: I Love Finding More Pups: Collector's Edition
summary: Who doesn’t love finding pups?

name: Illo Somnium Rapid Eye
summary:
Colonel Andrew has assigned agent John Salchichón of the "Delta" team the mission of rescuing General Mark, who was held hostage by the terrorist organization calling itself "Alpha", to this day the leader or team leaders.

You must infiltrate the organization's operations castle and rescue the target alive, our intelligence has reported that the team has been doing cloning experiments, possibly, their army is made up of clones of their best soldiers, you must be cautious.

name: Illusion Pathology
summary: "Illusion Pathology" is a suspenseful and slightly scary B female love game. You will wake up as a doctor in a mental hospital, and become entangled with three suspicious "patients" around you, and your life and memory will be gradually revealed.

name: Illuminascii
summary: Illuminascii - a first person shooter with an ascii text based visual style, featuring randomly generated content and roguelike / rpg elements. Monsters, weapons, armor, levels and cutscenes are all created with random characteristics.

name: Illuminate Frame
summary: "Illuminate Frame" is a mouse-click-only simple puzzle game where you strategically place various tiles on the board to conduct electricity from power tiles to terminal tiles, aiming for high scores.

name: Il Suo Volto Era Una Maschera Di Sangue
summary:
Silent Hill but it's an italian giallo.

During the celebrations of an old folk festival a man is found dead inside the village’s church. All the inhabitants have something to hide.

Explore the mysterious town of Montechiuso, the background of paranormal phenomena and mysterious murders.

name: illWill
summary: Eliminate hordes of monsters in illWill, a thrilling first person shooter. The game features breathtaking locations filled with hundreds of monsters and polished gameplay containing all the best of old school shooters. You have a variety of weapons at your disposal - from a double barrel shotgun, warm and beloved as grandma's soup, to a soul ripper with gameplay mechanic unseen before.

name: I’ll Fuck Your Grandpa!
summary: A frank visual novel for adults, where you will find yourself in the role of a young woman who finds special pleasure in sex with old men.

name: Illusive Domain
summary: Deflect, parry, and defeat your opponents through intense boss rush action. Fight for you and your allies’ freedom, lest you remain entombed forever more.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Fortresses and Focke-Wulfs - Dieppe
summary: IL-2 Sturmovik: Fortresses and Focke-Wulfs - Dieppe is a realistic and challenging combat flight simulation set over the embattled beach fortress of Dieppe, France in WWII. Fly and fight in Focke-Wulfs, Messerschmitts, Spitfires, Typhoons, P-51’s and B-17’s as the iconic Raid of 1942 unfolds below.

name: I Love My Little Girl
summary: Play with the baby of your dreams! Hair, face, clothes... Choose the baby of your dreams and discover lots of ways to look after her the way you want: preparing meals, dressing up in different outfits, bathing, playing, going for walks… Unlock new, even more adorable outfits for your toddler. Cute and colourful graphics with 3D babies Your baby laughs and cries just like a real one!

name: Illumina Defender
summary: Defend the vibrant world of Illumina from descending enemies in this retro-styled, fast-paced, single-player arcade game. Utilize strategic upgrades to keep the city safe and enjoy an electrifying soundtrack while you do it!

name: I'll Kill Her
summary: Visual novel in the form of interactive comic book about love, life and fighting to be heard.

name: Illusion Lands
summary: Illusion Lands is a third-person slasher game that combines a gripping storyline and colorful combat. Players take on the role of Erwin, a powerful hunter of the Devourers, giant creatures whose nature remains to be discovered. Explore the vast world of the game and discover its countless secrets

name: I'll Be Here.
summary: "I'll be here" is a 10-hour prototype made for the NYU Game Center's prototype studio MFA class. This prototype is designed to be played alongside Emperatriz Ung's "On A Cloudy Day."

name: I Love Horses
summary:
Welcome to the Ranch! 
 
Explore the amazing world of Greenhill Ranch, home to championship horses. Discover 20 fun mini-games that let your teach, train and groom your horse. With the right training, you and your horse will take the crown at the big tournament. Life at the ranch has never been this much fun. 
20 Amazing Adventures: Train, play with and care for your horses in 20 fun mini-games! Dash across raging rapids, play hide and seek, and even sing along with the Greenhill horse choir! 
Touch and Train: Interact with your horses through simple DS stylus controls! 
Capture the Memories: Photograph your horses and view the pictures in your photo album. 
Fun & Games: Navigate the obstacle course, tackle agility challenges and learn to do fantastic tricks as you develop a bond with your horse that can never broken.

name: I Looked Out
summary: Debut game from Kit Le Bihan released as part of the O2A2: One of Every Asset game jam 2025. Short visual novel featuring a conversation with an unnamed narrator in a cable car.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Flying Circus - Volume II
summary: Above the brutal meatgrinder of the Great War trench warfare there was a ballet of winged machines made largely of canvas and wood, piloted by knights for a new age, who dueled to the death in a most personal way.

name: Illvelo Swamp Happy Together
summary:
Illvelo Swamp Happy Together is the new and evolved version of the previous title, Illvelo Swamp.

Swim through 100 stages of happiness via two unique modes—Regular Mode and Dev Mode—equipped with multi-ability weapon, the Doll.

Be prepared for endlessly happy shoot ’em up experience.

name: Ila: A Frosty Glide
summary:
Set foot on a magical island and immerse yourself in a whimsical small open world as ILA, a spirited young witch-in-training with her trusty skatebroom. Explore, find secret places, collectables, and improve your magic and flying abilities as you make your way to the summit.

Explore a whimsical small open world as ILA, a spirited young witch-in-training. Start your journey fueled by determination and your trusty skatebroom. Find secret places, collect valuable items, and improve your magical flying abilities.

Who needs a broom when you have a skatebroom? Soar through snowy mountains and enchanted forests, feel the wind as you cross stunning landscapes. Master and upgrade the magic of your to soar higher and farther.

Explore ILA’s small open world at your own pace and relax. Find hidden nooks, uncover treasures, and unlock secrets flying on your skatebroom. Each discovery rewards you with valuable items and deeper lore, enriching your magical journey.

Collect special items and coins to personalize ILA’s outfit with stylish hats, capes, and skatebrooms to reflect your unique style. As you progress, access new skatebroom upgrades to improve ILA’s flying powers.

Feel the magic and enjoy the captivating original soundtrack composed by Joaquim Scandurra (Sku), which builds up and grows with you as you approach the summit.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Forgotten Battles
summary: IL-2 Sturmovik: Forgotten Battles is a combat flight simulator video game, and sequel to the 2001 combat flight simulation of the year IL-2 Sturmovik. Unlike the first instalment, Forgotten Battles focuses on the Soviet-Finnish Continuation War of 1941-1944.

name: Illbleed
summary: Illbleed is a tongue-in-cheek survival horror game and a send-up to horror Clichés. Despite being financially unsuccessful, this game received a worldwide cult following for its notable combination of nonlinear gameplay elements (e.g. trap detection) and bizarre B-movie style comedy horror theme, dialogue and voice acting.

name: Illuminaria
summary: Command a swarm of intelligent robots in their quest to save the world. Mine resources, manage, and defend multiple bases. Go on expeditions, fight in auto-battles, research new technologies, and create your army of golems to bring back the light.

name: Illumination
summary: A mini-comic featuring The Botanist trying to fix the lights at his outpost.

name: I Live Under Your House.
summary: You are a monster under someone's house.

name: Illusion City
summary:
Illusion City is a Japanese-style role-playing game with several distinguishing characteristics. Unlike most games of the genre, it has no overworld, and takes place entirely in a vast city divided into several districts. The player advances the story by exploring the city, talking to non-playable characters, gathering information, receiving missions, and eventually heading into large, complex hostile areas. There are no random battles in the game; all enemies are visibly moving on the field, and many of them can be avoided.

Combat is turn-based, utilizing an "over-the-shoulder" perspective similar to that of Phantasy Star II. Characters join the party as dictated by the plot; an active party includes three combatants. A wide variety of weapon and armor types can be purchased or found in dungeons. Each character has his or her own weapon proficiencies, which can be increased by repeatedly using the same weapon type. Firearms require specific ammunition (e.g. bullets, shotgun cartridges, etc.), which is expended in combat and must be re-stocked. In addition, certain characters can use offensive, supportive, and healing techniques.

The game's visual style aims for realistic presentation of locations and characters, and shares more common traits with contemporary Western visual aesthetics than the traditional Japanese anime art.

name: Il Sole e la Luna
summary: Adventure Fantasy RPG Il Sole e la Luna! Spettacolare rpg ambientato in un era fantasy! Scegli la tua classe: eroe, guerriero, mago, prete. Sali di livello, sviluppa il tuo equipaggiamento, scopri tantissimi segreti, mostri da cacciare, trova tutte le armi elementali e sconfiggi possenti Dei!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Tank Crew: Clash at Prokhorovka
summary: Tank Crew is a new ground-breaking tank simulator that allows you to experience WWII from inside one of ten legendary WWII tanks and battle enemy armored units for control of the village of Prokhorovka and the surrounding area during the battle of Kursk in 1943.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Ta 152 H-1 Collector Plane
summary: The Ta 152 was the last creation of the German aircraft designer Kurt Tank, which managed to take part in combat operations during the Second World War. This aircraft was the culmination of the evolution of the Fw 190 fighter and Germany's most advanced piston fighter. It was in development for a long time, several years, and appeared at the very end of the war. During the development, several modifications of the original Fw 190 were produced, which finally led to the Ta 152 - the name "Fw" was changed to "Ta" in recognition of the designer's merits.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Ta 152 H-1 Collector Plane
summary: The Ta 152 was the last creation of the German aircraft designer Kurt Tank, which managed to take part in combat operations during the Second World War. This aircraft was the culmination of the evolution of the Fw 190 fighter and Germany's most advanced piston fighter. It was in development for a long time, several years, and appeared at the very end of the war. During the development, several modifications of the original Fw 190 were produced, which finally led to the Ta 152 - the name "Fw" was changed to "Ta" in recognition of the designer's merits.

name: IL13-Sonya E-Links
summary: "IL13-Sonya E-Links" is a 2D roguelite action game where you swiftly cut through enemies while stealing energy. Control Sonya, with radiant wings and a tail, mastering dodges, parries, and breaks to charge energy! Power your weapons with charged energy and unleash flashy actions to defeat enemies!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad
summary: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad is the continuation of the legendary IL-2 Sturmovik series that has set the standard for combat flight games for more than 10 years. This new entry into the series will offer virtual pilots an even more accurate simulation of the legendary air battles of World War II. A new higher level of physics modeling, damage modeling and aerodynamics has been achieved which allows for far greater realism than in any other title.

name: Illuminum
summary: Isometric RPG where we find ourselves in the mysterious tower Illuminum. Kill monsters, become stronger, learn new skills and discover truth about this place.

name: Illumination of Mansion
summary: Step into a haunted mansion where every move counts! Illumination of Mansion horror-puzzle game mixes Minesweeper mechanics with a horror genre atmosphere. Solve puzzles, uncover dangers, and survive through to rooms - if you can.

name: Illusion: A Tale of the Mind
summary: Illusion is a puzzle exploration game set in the ambience of the early 1920’s Parisian cabaret. Step into the shoes of a young girl named Emma and live her adventures as she is trapped inside the mind of a mad man. Embark on her journey through the mind’s-eye of her captors, living in a fractured world of old memories and festering wounds, that paradoxically reveals itself to be also a place of great beauty and intrigue.

name: Illegal Simulator
summary: "Illegal Simulator" puts you in the midst of two different lives. While running a legal market during the day, you'll manage illegal casinos and harvest banned substances at night. Collaborate with mafia gangs, have fun at strip clubs, and become the most famous figure in the underworld!

name: illuminati Simulator VR
summary: This simulator, features a real and completely accurate Freemasonry temple. as well as an Ordo Templi Orientis Gnostic Mass working lodge... it is an Experience more than a game. when you purchase this title you can expect to be teleported to a virtual freemasonry lodge where you will be able to perform any ritual you may want in a safe...

name: Ilomilo
summary: ilomilo is a puzzle game developed by Southend Interactive and Microsoft Game Studios. It was released on Windows Phone 7 on November 8, 2010 for AT&T customers.[2] On November 26, 2010, a "secret" website was made available where players could get a code to download a trial and purchase the game early, while the game was officially released on Xbox Live Arcade on January 5, 2011.

name: Illusion of Gaia
summary:
Journey into the dark side of an ancient civilization.

Radiating an ominous light in its path, the Chaos Comet threatens the existence of the planet. Battles erupt and a tentative peace is returned to the lands. Danger lurks as the Chaos Comet orbits and dreadful beasts lie awaiting.

In the Age of Exploration a boy named Will is born. Tragedy strikes during an expedition to the Tower of Babel separating Will from his father. Telekinetic forces awaken as Will returns to South Cape. Armed with his transformation abilities of two great warriors, Will must save the planet.

Gaia, Will's guiding spirit bestows magical powers and advice along his journey. With the help of his friends Will must battle relentless enemies and solve the puzzles of the ancient ruins. Patience and knowledge are essential to reunite this father and son.

name: I Love Me, I Love Me Not
summary: Play this game every time you need to remind yourself that you love who you are.

name: I Love My Brother
summary: That is what happens from time to time: people fall in love with another people. That is what happened to Beth... And now she dreams. She desires. She plans.

name: I'll Come Back to You
summary: A heartwarming game about coming home for the holidays and following your dreams as a pianist.

name: I Love Finding Furbabies
summary: Collect cute furry creatures in this engaging hidden object game.

name: Il Piccolo Freakstein
summary: Il Piccolo Freakstein is an educational PC and Mac game.

name: Illust Logic DS + Colorful Logic
summary: A DS Nonogram/Picross game from Hudson released in 2007 after they stopped using it's "puzzle Series" branding. It features both standard picross style puzzles and color based puzzles with a range of categories including puzzles that re-create sprites from classic Hudson games.

name: Ilha do Empreendedor
summary: Ilha do Empreendedor is an educational business simulator focused on the five steps to opening new companies: opportunity analysis, planning, gathering resources, investment, and opening. Three players play against each other trying to be the most successful business manager in a board game play style.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Battle of Bodenplatte
summary:
The fourth installment of the next-gen IL-2 Sturmovik lineup is dedicated to late war aerial engagements between the U.S. Army Air Force, Royal Air Force and the Luftwaffe in the skies over western Germany, the Netherlands and Belgium during the winter of 1944 and early 1945. Bodenplatte was the German code word for the bold operation to launch a surprise low-level attack on multiple Allied airfields on Jan 1st, 1945. It contains eight aircraft (additional Collector Planes are available as separate DLCs).

Battle of Bodenplatte puts you at the scene of some of the most important battles on the Western Front as the Allies are knocking on Germany’s door and trying to cross the Rhine River into Germany for the first time. Fly in support of Operation Market Garden, the Battle of the Bulge and Operation Bodenplatte. Try to once and for all destroy the Luftwaffe or try to blunt the Allied advance into Germany. It’s was the peak piston-engine power and the dawn of the jet age, a time when famous Allied aces roamed the sky and desperate German defenders were trying to just survive, now outnumbered and no longer the masters of the air. Fight in aerial engagements over lush, green farmland and dense wooded forests or find yourself twisting and turning over frozen fields and icy rivers of the bitterly cold winter of 1944-45. Do you have the skills to survive the harrowing air combat?

IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Bodenplatte adds a new Western front theater to the IL-2 Sturmovik: Great Battles series of products. Steam requires you own Battle of Stalingrad before you can add Battle of Bodenplatte. Combined with Battle of Stalingrad, Battle of Moscow and Battle of Kuban, the series covers the combat pilot experience spanning both Eastern and Western fronts in WWII. Dogfight over the frozen steppes of Russia, the scenic mountains and beaches the Caucasus region or the doorstep of Germany itself. There is not a more monumental combat flight-simulator experience on the market with such a wide range of planes and theaters crafted to this level of detail. The physics, realism, systems, beauty, atmosphere, features, gameplay, performance, history and options combine to set a new standard of playability and fun in this important genre. IL-2 Sturmovik: Great Battles series is not a simply a PC game, it’s an AIR COMBAT SIMULATOR. Learn what it takes to become a WWII Ace!

name: Illusion
summary: The city where everything is possible... But where it could also be fake.

name: I Love Finding Cats!: Collector's Edition
summary: I Love Finding Cats is a classic Hidden Object game with a great selection of mini-games. Visit beautiful locations from across the globe while you find and collect adorable feline friends! This Collector's Edition also includes Christmas Bonus levels.

name: I Love Finding Pups!: Collector's Edition
summary: Visit beautiful locations from across the globe while you find and collect adorable canine companions! I Love Finding Pups features classic hidden object gameplay across a wide variety of scenes with a great collection of mini-games sprinkled throughout!

name: Illumine
summary: Experience a different take on the roguelike genre. Explore a world created on the fly by your actions. Wonder about your purpose.

name: Illusion
summary: It was only after I and my buddies escaped from the terrifying laboratory that I realized that there might be a bigger conspiracy behind it. The adventure is far from over, But don't forget, what's happening here is just the beginning.

name: I Love My Job!
summary: The future of office job simulation is here!

name: Illville: Return instructions
summary: By chance, you find yourself in a faraway English village where the sun doesn't rise for decades. To find the way home you have to follow the beam of the lighthouse. Be careful, anyone on this path could be your enemy.

name: Illusion
summary: It was only after I and my buddies escaped from the terrifying laboratory that I realized that there might be a bigger conspiracy behind it. The adventure is far from over, But don't forget, what's happening here is just the beginning.

name: ILive
summary: A game in the classic platformer genre, with elements of survival. Interesting style of decoration locations. You have to avoid collisions with aggressive robots androidiki that will come across you all the way. Which will follow you, shoot, gnaw! you are harmless ifonia

name: Il Fiore di Moretti
summary: You are a renowned chef who accepts a job at "Il Fiore di Moretti," an Italian restaurant preparing for its grand reopening. Your task is to cook and ensure that customers return for your delicious food. However, you start to notice that strange things are happening in the restaurant. They are subtle, almost imperceptible, but enough to make you realize that something is very wrong...

name: I Love Finding Wild Friends: Collector's Edition
summary: Discover lovable wild animals in this thrilling hidden object game!

name: I Love Finding Cats & Pups
summary: Have a pawsome adventure finding cats and pups!

name: Illusion
summary:
Play as a noble knight on a quest to defeat the sorceress terrorizing a small village. Be careful, not everything is real...

Defeat Illusions! Uncover secret paths! Face the Illusionist!

name: I'll respond to that later
summary: on (not) texting back your friends

name: Illiteracy
summary: How to learn

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Steel Birds Campaign
summary: In spring 1943, the tide of the air war is slowly turning against the Luftwaffe, are you up to the challenge?

name: Illuminati Tycoon
summary: We need more gold!

name: Illusion of Gaia: Remake
summary: A fan-remake, not official and non-profit of the classic SNES game "Illusion of Gaia".

name: I Love You!
summary:
Follow the antics of a strong-headed female protagonist through her school days in I Love You!, a visual novel otome game where you could meet and date some good boys depending on the choices you make!

Take the lead in the relationship and live an unforgettable school festival with your friends, or even your future boyfriend. What fun moments will ensue? Who will you choose in the end?

name: I Love Katamari
summary: I Love Katamari is a continuation of the addictive Katamari Damacy formula on the iOS mobile platforms.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - MC.202 Series VIII Collector Plane
summary: Fly the Italian Macchi 202, the best Italian fighter plane that saw action at the Eastern front of WWII!

name: Illegal Excavation
summary: Welcome to the exciting journey. In order to stand up, you will witness the adventures he lived in his mysterious treasures. You will be challenged! Getting caught in booby traps or your enemies will be a real journey where you must find their treasures and Discover their mysteries by solving clues.

name: Il Grande Gioco di Tangentopoli
summary: Il Grande Gioco di Tangentopoli is an Italian game based on the "Mani Pulite" political scandal. It features two types of levels: the first involves shooting at various passing politicians, while the second requires recovering paperwork.

name: I Love my Little Boy
summary:
Play with the baby of your dreams!

Hair, face, clothes... Choose the baby of your dreams and discover lots of ways to look after him the way you want: preparing meals, dressing up in different outfits, bathing, playing, going for walks

-Unlock new, even more adorable outfits for your toddler.
-Cute and colourful graphics with 3D babies
-Your baby laughs and cries just like a real one!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: La-5F Series 38 Collector Plane
IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Spitfire Mk.XIVe with Teardrop Canopy
summary: The Spitfire Mk. XIV was originally built with a “high back” rear fuselage which restricted visibility to the rear of the plane. To rectify this problem, the Mk. XIV with a cut-down rear fuselage and tear-drop canopy began to be developed and built at the end of 1944.

name: Il Divino: Michelangelo's Sistine Ceiling in VR
summary: Step onto Michelangelo’s scaffold to learn about how he painted the ceiling, or enter a Vatican conservator’s mobile aerial platform to see the ceiling up close and learn about the controversial cleaning. Over 100 clickable elements about Michelangelo’s work.

name: Illum
summary: Embark on a heartwarming journey with your little light friend to solve puzzles and bring light to the mystical realm of Illum.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Hs 129 B-2 Collector Plane
summary: The Hs 129 was designed to be a general purpose armored ground attack plane, but during the second part of the war it became the main anti-tank aircraft flown by the Luftwaffe.

name: Illusoria
summary: Illusoria is a game where players can immerse themselves in a fantasy world full of wonderful characters and terrible monsters. A place where death lurks past every corner and where patience and expertise will be your best allies.

name: I Love Finding Cats & Pups - Collector's Edition
summary: Have a pawsome adventure finding cats and pups!

name: Illuminator
summary: A game featured in Action 52 in which the player must navigate a dark screen that only lights up briefly after defeating an enemy.

name: Il Destino R
summary: The fourth game released by Gotmail, a more difficult version of Il Destino. It features multiple language options and different puzzles. The player must escape a car shop.

name: Ilya Muromets
summary: A Russian flight sim.

name: Illness in the East
summary: Adventure RPG with horror elements and a touch of Eastern European history and mythology. The story of two girls who had a hard time of General illness.

name: Iles
summary: A platform game.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Cliffs of Dover - Blitz Edition
summary: Join the decisive aerial battle of the 20th Century - The Battle of Britain. Zoom over the white cliffs as a Fighter pilot in the Spitfires and Hurricanes of the Royal Air Force, or pilot the black crossed Bf-109's and Bf-110's of the Luftwaffe and the Italian Fiat G-50 of the Regia Aeronautica. Accept the technical challenge of flying bombers or attack aircraft like the German Junkers 88, Heinkel and Stuka, the Italian Fiat BR-20, or the British Bristol Blenheim or Beaufighter. IL-2 STURMOVIK: CLIFFS OF DOVER: BLITZ EDITION is the completely revised re-release from 1C Games with graphics upgraded to DX 11, new aircraft, and new Flight and Damage models.

name: I Love Finding Wild Friends
summary: Discover lovable wild animals in this thrilling hidden object game!

name: I Love Finding 9-in-1 Bundle
summary: Amazing 9 hidden object games bundle!

name: I Love my Horse
summary:
Raise your horse and win all the competitions!

Open your own horse resort, then raise and train your horse to win the agility, racing and show-jumping competitions. Can you train the greatest champion?

Look after the horses placed in your care, and keep them happy and in good health through a variety of available activities. Feed them, brush them, care for them and pet them!

name: I Love My Dogs
summary: Become a best friend to the animals!

name: I Love my Cats
summary: Become a best friend to the animals by taking in abandoned kittens.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Ten Days of Autumn Campaign
summary: This campaign shows the actions of 3./JG 52 it the end of October 1941.

name: Il Maniero Spettrale
summary:
"Many brave adventurers have traveled to this manor. They never made it back. Enter the manor and rescue their souls."

"Il Maniero Spettrale" was originally made for the Halloween Level Design Contest (HLDC) 2014, in which it won first place. It's a single large level with a "Metroidvania" structure, inspired by the likes of Luigi's Mansion, Castlevania: Symphony of the Night and Banjo-Kazooie. The goal is to find the souls of the adventurers who visited the manor, and lead them to their eternal rest. For Halloween 2018, this was updated and released as a standalone hack, in order to make it more accessible to new players. There are several small improvements and fixes over the original and some rooms have been redesigned.

name: Illusia 2
summary:
Solve the mystery behind what is causing the nightmares! 
 
An evil force has invaded the Dream World giving everyone nightmares! Help the heroes Angela, Chris and Ares vanquish evil and restore peace to their land in this sequel to the hit RPG, ILLUSIA. 
 
With a thrilling storyline, full of twists and turns, ILLUSIA 2 takes the immersive gameplay of the original masterpiece and embellishes it with more colorful side scrolling adventures, diverse skill training and endless customizable options.

name: I Like Walking Very Much
summary:
I Like Walking Very Much is a textless 2D walking-simulator. Play as a strange spider who loves walking very much.

The game will be end in 30 minutes more or less, very easy control, There are no hidden items or achievements. It's very tiny game.

This game inspired by some my experiences in social life. Hate incites a desire for recognition, and it starts to make another hate.

Arts, codes sounds and tracks by camel504

Beautiful "Amatic Bold" font by Vernon Adams

name: I Love My Pony
summary: Discover a rich and enthralling story where you prove to your rival that love and respect for your pony are just as important as training. Choose your pony and care for it with a variety of activities. Your pony's health and happiness are key to your success in the competitions. Train at the riding centre and take part in the jumping and racing competitions to become a true champion!

name: Illusion
summary: The city where everything is possible but where it could also be fake.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Battle of Moscow
summary: This legendary battle of World War II took place from October 1941 to April 1942. The Battle of Moscow campaign takes place on a large-scale map (270 km x 290 km) (168 mi. x 180 mi.) with Autumn and Winter seasonal terrain.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Blazing Steppe Campaign
summary: This historical campaign is set during the early stage of the Stalingrad battle when the German XIV Panzer Corps breached through to the Volga River and the Luftwaffe unleashed all of its might on the civilian districts and defense lines of the city.

name: Illuminator
summary: Armed with just a flashlight, a boy sets out to save his sister from a band of nasty ghouls who have the ability to tear through the fabric of space and who travel from house to house in the dead of night.

name: Iltami
summary: 2D Fantasy game. Chill and easy to play or fast and difficult..? The GREEN circle is for play, the BLUE circle is for controls. Collect all the birds and reach all the levels as fast as possible. Have fun! It goes well with red wine or cold beer...

name: Illuminati Online
summary: Destroy the organization aiming to establish a New World Order! Choose your race against the sinful leaders of the Illuminati: "Ball Gates, Epstein, Rockafeller." Will you join the human resistance to fight against them, or side with the Reptilian race to destroy and replace the Illuminati?

name: IlinkWord Play
summary: Connect letters to make up words.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Fw 190 D-9 Collector Plane
summary: It started to appear above the front lines during Autumn 1944 and although it got a cold initial reception from the German pilots, it later earned their trust and is considered to be the best German piston-powered fighter of the late war period.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - GAZ-MM 72-K Anti-Aircraft Gun
summary: This mobile AAA gun allows you to protect an armored column, supply convoy, infantry unit or a stationary target like an airbase with accurate and deadly fire.

name: I Love Finding Pups
summary: I Love Finding Pups is a classic Hidden Object game. Explore stunning locations through hidden object scenes and minigames while collecting all the adorable pups!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - I.A.R. 80-A and 80-B Collector Planes
summary: First flown in 1939, the IAR-80 was comparable to other fighter aircraft designs of the late 1930s and would remain in service with the Royal Romanian Air Force throughout World War II until the end of the war in May 1945.

name: Illusion
summary: Delivery personnel headed to a condominium building to deliver a package.

name: I'll Put You In Debt
summary: A role-playing game from Tistrya.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Battle of Normandy
summary: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Normandy brings the air war surrounding the successful Allied invasion on France in June 1944 to life on computer screen!

name: Illove dream
summary: Illove dream (爱梦症) is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. You explore Aiko's dreams, who refuses to leave her room.

name: Illegal Communication
summary: Illegal Communication is a short, surreal action game with minimalistic, vector-like graphics. The player controls a "defence orb", deployed in order to destroy an "illegal communication". The controls and rules aren't explained in the game, and the player is challenged to find everything out on his own.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Spitfire Mk.VB Collector Plane
summary: The Supermarine Spitfire is a legendary example of British aircraft engineering and one of the best fighter aircraft of WWII.

name: IlloScape: Into the Illoverse
summary:
Hello!, this is my project for the "IlloJam 2024", the objective of this Jam was to make a game within a period of "1 Month" for Illojuan, so the game focuses on its lore.

It is a small "roguelite" Arcade game which begins while you are sleeping and you hear a voice telling you that Masi (your girlfriend) has disappeared, you must overcome 4 Worlds with their respective enemies and bosses to reach her.

name: Illuminary
summary: You find yourself catapulted back in time to the beginning of existence, and into the darkness where everything began. The Universe is yet to be born from a glimmer of light. You are called to discover and co-create a new existence with the help of colours and sound.

name: Illumination Laser
summary: Formally lost-media. Illumination Laser is a vertically scrolling shooter for the Sharp X68000. Originally developed near to completion in 1994, its creator TERRA released a finished build in 2014 in response to learning of an auction containing the older unfinished 1994 build.

name: Ilbis: The Ocean of Death
summary:
If you like choice interaction novel or just want to try something different. Dive in and start making choices that affect the whole outcome! 
Ilbis: The Ocean of Death is a choices game that have multiple ends. You make choices for the main character and the most important thing is your choices change the interaction the story. The choices you make impact the characters' life and set ending of the story game!

name: Illusion: Trust Test
summary: In this story, players will operate the white fluffy Pal on an adventure, and he will face new experimental tests and levels!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Desert Wings - Tobruk
summary: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Desert Wings - Tobruk is an immersive, realistic and challenging combat flight-simulation set over the sands of the North Africa campaign in WWII. Experience what it was like to fly and fight in Messerschmitts, Macchis, Kittyhawks and Spitfires during the Desert War.

name: Ilíada Espacial 2
summary: Destroy hordes of enemies and save Sivinina in this RPG-Space Shooter hybrid!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - P-40E-1 Collector Plane
summary: Fly the legendary P-40, the most mass-produced fighter by the US during WWII.

name: Illegal Dealership Simulator
summary: Navigate the cutthroat automotive world by buying, modifying, and selling cars for profit. Whether you build a legal empire or risk it all in the underworld of car theft and illegal activities, your choices shape your destiny. Will you rise as a legit dealer or dominate the shadows?

name: I Love Puppies!
summary: Explore the amazing world of Puppyville Farm, home to the most adorable litter of puppies around. Experience 20 fun filled mini-games where you get to train, play with, and groom your puppies. With simple stylus controls you'll be raising showworthy puppies in no time. Raising puppies has never been so fun and easy!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - P-38J-25 Collector Plane
summary: The P-38J-25 was a late model variant flown by the USAAF and saw action over Europe as well as in the Pacific.

name: Illegal Plantation
summary: It’s time to leave it all behind and do a dance with the law. Build your own illegal plantation, plant your weed, water them, maintain good air temperature and good lighting. Deliver your goods or hire local dealers for it. Get rid of the competition and build your own monopoly.

name: Illegal Mahjong
summary: Yuri, the former heiress of a company, finds her father's business bankrupt. To repay the debts, Yuri must compete in mahjong and continue to win. Can Yuri truly defeat her formidable opponents?

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Hurricane Mk.II Collector Plane
summary: The legendary British-built Hurricane came to fame during the Battle of Britain where it did the heavy lifting for the RAF in that pivotal battle. Unlike popular belief, it was the sturdy and more numerous Hurricane and not the sexier Spitfire that really made the difference.

name: I Love My Goblin Girlfriend
summary: I Love My Goblin Girlfriend is a one-player point-and-click adventure game designed to explore the age-old question: what does your girlfriend want to eat? It’s all about the snacks in this three-part mystery to figure out how to satisfy your goblin gal and unlock the smooch of your dreams. After all, a goblin girl’s gotta eat!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Great Battles
summary: IL-2 Sturmovik: Great Battles is the continuation of the legendary IL-2 Sturmovik series that has set the standard for PC combat flight games for more than ten years. This new entry into the series will offer virtual pilots an even more accurate simulation of the most famous air battles of World War II. Better quality of content, bigger scale, new physics, more realistic aerodynamics and new game elements set this title apart from all which came before. We have only one goal - To give you a New Higher Level of Immersion!

name: Il
summary: Robots invaded the earth, you have to explore their ship to eliminate them. A horror game based on an attempt to survive inside a space ship

name: Illusion Connect
summary:
Heed the call of justice and fight to defend reality!

Illusion Connect is a mobile real-time strategy game that allows you to build your Radiants, and socialize with them in a myriad of social modes! With more than 50 Radiants at your disposal, create your unique lineup to dominate the Nightmares!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Birds of Prey
summary:
IL-2 Sturmovik: Birds of Prey is based around the large-scale aerial combat and ground military operations of World War II. Players can participate in some of the war’s most famous battles piloting fighters, battle planes and bombers across a range of thrilling missions. There are six theatres of war to engage in – The Battle of Britain, Stalingrad, Ardennes, Berlin, Sicily and Korsun' representing the main airborne battles of World War II in Europe.

IL-2 Sturmovik: Birds of Prey also boasts an all new damage effects engine as well as advanced environmental visuals enriching the game play. Players can see real time damage to the aircraft such as holes in the wings and trail lines during dog fights. IL-2 Sturmovik: Birds of Prey features hundreds of airplanes taking part in air battles. The unique environmental engine also produces highly detailed, realistic landscapes that allow players to see breathtaking ground support actions.

name: I Love Finding More Pups
summary: Travel through all new locations as you befriend and adopt all new pups!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Yak-9 Series 1 Collector Plane
summary: Yak-9 proved itself as very maneuverable and easy to control fighter, earning the love and respect of many Soviet pilots along with volunteer French from the Normandie Niemen fighter regiment.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Arado Ar 234 B-2 Collector Plane
summary: Arado Ar 234 B-2 Jet Bomber

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Ju 52/3m Collector Plane
summary: Designed as a civilian passenger plane in 1930s, the Ju-52/Зm saw widespread use during the entire war, essentially becoming the symbol of Luftwaffe transport operations.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Cliffs of Dover Blitz
summary: Scramble to intercept in your RAF Spitfire or Hurricane. Or join huge formations of German or Italian Fighters and Bombers as they roar across the Channel towards London. Decide the fate of Britain!

name: Illwind
summary: A top-down steampunk coop romp where you embark on short action-packed adventures on an airship of your choice. Facing off against numerous enemies on your way to fame and fortune!

name: Illo: birth of the cool
summary: The game is designed to plunge the player into an uncharted territory governed by dynamics that need to be mastered in order to survive and progress. The player witnesses illo’s premature awakening in the wrong place, an unexplored environment populated by unexpected creatures where the sequence of events is neither modular nor foreseeable: a unique wonderland.

name: Illvelo: Illmatic Envelope
summary: Illvelo, also named Illmatic Envelope, is a vertical shmup initially released for the NAOMI arcade system by MileStone Inc. in 2008. It's mostly noticeable for its trippy level backgrounds, bizarre sound effects and wacky enemy visual designs.

name: I Love Traffic
summary: Control the lights. Get the required number through each level to move on. Levels get harder, traffic gets fuller... get ready for some major gridlock!

name: Illusions
summary:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1983

The enchanted mirror splits you into multiple images. You must become whole before time runs out. Changing stairways and folding cubes with SuperGraphics try to keep you from safety.

name: Illyriad - 4X Grand Strategy MMO
summary: Build a city, Create an Empire! Research 400+ technologies, and Build 70+ buildings, Craft and Trade 380+ items in an entirely player driven market. Fight Wars and Forge Alliances with thousands of players and create your own Empire in this award-winning, critically-acclaimed MMO.

name: I Love You like a Fat Lady Loves Apples
summary: I Love You like a Fat Lady Loves Apples is a thrilling casual game.

name: I Love My Pets
summary:
Become the manager of a hotel for cats and dogs and take care of your pets. Take your puppy out for a walk in the park, teach them to jump over a skipping rope, pet them and play frisbee with them. Brush your cat, teach them to hunt, train them for an obstacle course... and make them purr!

Choose between 16 breeds of cats and dogs: Dalmatian, Labrador, Husky, Siamese, tabby and more... and play hide-and-seek with your pet with the AR Cards which came with your Nintendo 3DS!

name: Illumina Girls
summary: Illumina Girls is an exhilarating 3D block breaking game with a new sensation.

name: I Love Finding Birds
summary: Your new feathered friends are taking you to the sky!

name: Illie
summary:
Using your keyboard to move, you need to clear your path to exit by stepping in every available tile just once. How long will you take to beat the 60 levels? Most of them have more than one way to finish.
“illie” is a tile based puzzle game.

name: I'll Do It Tomorrow
summary: It's Sara's first day of work. However, when she takes the elevator to go to the office, she suddenly finds herself on a mysterious floor. What truth lies behind these weird rooms? Will you be able to move on? Or rather... will you want to move on?

name: Illegal Race Tuning
summary: Go to the street and become the most wanted racer dominating the Underground.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Battle of Kuban
summary: The third installment of the next-gen IL-2 Sturmovik series is dedicated to large scale aerial battles between the Red Air Force and the Luftwaffe in the skies over the Kuban front in 1943.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Spitfire Mk.XIV Collector Plane
summary: Spitfire Mk.XIV

name: Illustris
summary: A 2D Top-Down game taking place in space. Experience fast paced combat, solve physics based puzzles and travel the whole galaxy.

name: Illusion Within
summary: Gabriel - A psychedelic horror detective game in which you have to stage Ragnarok to get your beloved back. Travel through the worlds of Scandinavia, destroying the giants of Jotun to fulfill your part of the deal promised to Loki, the god of perfidy. You will have to decide who to trust.

name: Ilysia
summary:
Embark on the adventure of a lifetime in the first true MMORPG made exclusively for Virtual Reality.

Ages ago, the Lagenans corrupted their world, causing a great rift that split the very planet itself. Fearing their own destruction, they created great portals powered by the blood of their gods, seeking to inhabit another nearby planet: Ilysia. Using their portals, the Lagenans entered Ilysia looking to establish a new home for their people where they could continue to practice their dark arts and thrive.

Will you help the Lagenans secure their hold on Ilysia, or defend the planet against them? The Choice is yours - fight, explore, and grow in power; alone or alongside your friends and foes as you face the challenges Ilysia holds.

In Ilysia, players will travel alongside one another or embark on solo journeys as they quest, fight, grow, and explore a multitude of unique areas with their own set of challenges throughout their adventures. These zones will present an increasing challenge of monsters, quests, dungeons, world bosses, caves, and large outdoor cities, all waiting to be explored, conquered, and to have their secrets revealed. Live the wonder, excitement, and glory days of MMOs like never before, in truly immersive VR.

name: Illvanian no Shiro: Ruins of Illvanian
summary: Illvanian no Shiro: Ruins of Illvanian is a Strategy game, published by Nippon Clary Business, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Illi
summary: Illi is a polished one button platform puzzler. As the creature illi, you jump your way through a strange world where gravity follows you! Things you take for granted in your world is different here. illi travels through portals and enters barren worlds where she gathers light crystals that remain. The creature illi can bend the fabrics of the world and make gravity-defying jumps. Each new unique world introduces new mechanics, traps and obstacles, which will make each world a bigger and more difficult task than the last.

name: Illegal Crime Game
summary: Explore the city and commit crimes. Collect money and commit crimes. Pray to your Crime Deity and invade tombs.

name: I Love You, Colonel Sanders! A Finger Lickin' Good Dating Simulator
summary:
From the same people who brought you the bucket of chicken, comes the world’s first Colonel Sanders dating simulator.

I Love You, Colonel Sanders! A Finger Lickin’ Good Dating Simulator follows you, a promising culinary student, as you try to date your classmate, Colonel Sanders. Throughout your journey, you’ll be faced with life-changing decisions that will affect your chances of friendship and love. But be careful! Your choices have real consequences with real animated characters’ feelings at stake.

Do you have what it takes to survive culinary school? Will Colonel Sanders choose you to be his business partner? Or maybe even so much more? Find out in the most finger lickin’ good dating simulator ever created—a game that KFC actually made.

Features:
- 9 lovable characters
- Multiple hours of play-through
- Dateable Colonel Sanders
- A secret ending! Shh!
- Secret recipes! Double Shh!
- Cooking battles
- Battle battles
- Earn a degree from a fictional culinary school
- 11 Herbs and Spices
- Cute miniature food
- Officially created by KFC. No, really

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Fortress on the Volga Campaign
summary: When the continuous German assaults on the city were met with Soviet counterstrikes, the fight for air superiority wasn't any less furious. You'll be the deputy Staffel commander in I./JG 52 that has been redirected to Stalingrad from the central part of the Eastern front.

name: Illusion: Ghost Killer
summary: Set up six cameras in strategic positions to capture the elusive Jeff the Killer on film.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Yak-1b Collector Plane
summary: The Yak-1b, also know as the Yak-1 Series 127, is the pinnacle of the Yak-1 fighter design that includes all of the incremental improvements introduced in 1942.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Birds of Prey
summary: Experience the rush of aerial combat as you engage in history's most iconic airborne missions. Annihilate your enemies as you launch into massive dogfights and aerial bombing missions. Battle for supremacy over stunning landscapes from the patchwork fields of Southern England to the smoking ruins of Stalingrad. * Battle hundreds of enemy aces for control of the skies in intense multiplayer dogfights and bombing sorties * Choose a difficulty level to match your experience from adrenaline-fueled arcade action to realistic simulations * Relive the golden age of military aviation piloting 13 classic aircraft through 42 death-defying missions.

name: Il Filo Conduttore
summary: A small interactive story about about a cord.

name: I Love Finding Critters
summary: I Love Finding Critters is a classic hidden object game where you can search for a huge assortment of animals! Squirrels, hamsters, chicks, ducks, and so many more! Find them all in beautiful scenic locations and solve puzzles and play mini games as you go along.

name: Illusions
summary: Illusions is a surreal ColecoVision video game in which the player maneuvers blobs around the screen, trying to get them to merge, or, alternatively, split apart. At times, lizards may chase the blobs around. The water bucket, when spilled, can cause the lizard to turn into a fish. If the fish remains there too long, however, it turns into a bird. The game was created by Nice Ideas, a division of Mattel that was located midway between Cannes and Nice.

name: I Love Finding More Cats
summary: I Love Finding Cats is back with even MORE CATS! Find all the different kinds of cute and adorable cats as you visit different locations.

name: I Like the Flowers
summary: This is an atmospheric and soulful game about memories and life.

name: I Love You Freddy
summary: ah the celebrity life, the fame, and glamour, the wealth, and the insane psychopathic fan girl who chases you around an island she trapped you in, isn't the celebrity life wonderful!

name: Illusion Squares
summary: Illusion is image based minimalistic puzzle game. Just rotating pieces for solve coded image. This game is the perfect for jigsaw lovers. Best choice for relaxing and fun with your family.

name: Illurama: Masters of Illusions
summary:
Illurama: Masters of Illusions it's a bullet hell shmup in the form of a platformer! Inspired by such games like Touhou Project, Dodonpachi, Megaman and more.
Enemies and bosses will shoot projectiles, but beware because they will shoot a TON OF BULLETS.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Achtung Spitfire! Campaign
summary: The Achtung Spitfire! campaign story is inspired by historical events, while its 20 missions have fictional circumstances and use randomization to increase replayability.

name: I Love Pasta
summary:
We invite you to I Love Pasta! Order social dishes from the beautiful 2nd floor terrace. The more you play, the more special bonuses there is for you to enjoy!

Produce various ingredients all over the world, and make new menus at your restaurant! When you complete a new menu, you will find landmark items for decorating the distinctive market towns of each country or new patrons will visit your restaurants.

name: Illusory Dreamlight 1: Deprimerie
summary: A short RPG which follows the adventures of Tyson, who's put into a weird world after having a strange encounter with a kitchen sink and a house fire. He soon learns he must travel this strange land and save this world, or fall to the power of Nightmare and erode away.

name: I Love Me, I Love Me Not
summary:
I Love Me, I Love Me Not is a casual relaxing game focusing on teaching players healthy mental-health habits.

You'll play as a sunflower who's been feeling physically and mentally drained, losing their petals - a part of themself - as a result. You'll wander, explore and meet new friends around this beautiful flower field, each teaching you a healthy habit, helping you grow yourself back together again!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Flying Circus: Volume I
summary: Experience what is was like to be an early aviation pioneer and test the tactics and machines that would forever change warfare by bringing it to the skies for the first time.

name: I Like Being With You
summary: This is a sweet game in which the player control a rabbit running around the moon with another rabbit (his/her lover). The game is simple in control and has very pleasant grahpic and sweet music.

name: I Love Finding Birds: Collector's Edition
summary: Enjoy amazing and colourful birds in new hidden object adventure!

name: I Lost My Luggage
summary: I Lost My Luggage is a chaotic organization game. Find people their lost luggage back, and keep the facility organized!

name: Illvelo Swamp
summary: The latest game in the Illvelo (Illimatic Envelope) STG Series, Developed by RS34. The game is noted for it's branching level structure and focus on surreal visuals.

name: Illuminati
summary: Join the conspiracy of global domination and dark satire in this classic from Steve Jackson Games. As one of the Illuminati, you are driven by power, money, mayhem and more. Grow stronger as you plot to destroy your rivals. How will you take over the world?

name: I Love Hue
summary:
This is a challenge to eyesight, which is a test of speed.
Move your fingers, open your eyes, and quickly find the difference.
Are you the strongest brain, let's witness the miracle, and make the colors in fashion.

name: I Love Finding Cats
summary: I Love Finding Cats is a classic Hidden Object game. Explore a variety of different hidden object scenes, lots of minigame puzzles and most importantly collect all the adorable cats!

name: I Love Horses: Rider's Paradise
summary: Make your dreams come to life by riding in Riders Paradise! Play the role of Natalie, a new student at Riders Paradise. Learn to ride and care for horses, live a storyline about friendship, love for horses, wrong choices, sacrifice and responsibility. Take part in equestrian events such as dressage, jumping and cross country competitions

name: Il Destino
summary: The third game released by Gotmail, this time in collaboration with the used car website Goo-net. The player must escape a car shop.

name: Ily
summary: Two Mushrooms, lots of puzzles!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Overlord Campaign
summary: Six man canvas tents, a steel mat landing strip and generous supplies of slippery mud clearly indicated they were preparing for the upcoming move to the continent with the front line invasion forces.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Yak-9T Series 1 Collector Plane
summary: Yak-9T was capable of not only engaging bombers and various ground targets, but could also hold its own as a dogfighter.

name: Illarion
summary: Illarion is an on­line game where genu­ine role playing is en­forced. The main design prin­ciple is a fo­cus on the in­ter­ac­tion with other play­ers. All the player char­ac­ters you will en­counter dur­ing your time here are liv­ing, breath­ing in­hab­it­ants of the mys­ter­i­ous world of Illarion. Each char­ac­ter has its own past, goals, strengths, flaws and per­son­al­ity. Ex­per­i­ence glor­i­ous ad­ven­tures as noble knight or live the life of a hard­work­ing crafts­man, ac­quis­it­ive mer­chant or cha­ris­matic priest of the gods.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik
summary: Soaring through deadly realistic 3D landscapes, pilots can engage in numerous action-packed single-play missions involving air-to-air, air-to-ground, search & destroy and escort missions.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Forgotten Battles - Ace
summary: Touted as the most realistic WWII flight simulation game to date, IL-2: Forgotten Battles soars to new heights with this exhilarating expansion pack.

name: Illumina!
summary: Fantasy ero RPG developed by Cocktail Soft. for the PC-88, PC-98 and X68000.

name: Illegal Football
summary: This is a surrealistic football game. You will form a national football team composed of super heroes, use some unusual ways (such as match-fixing, bribing the refree), and lead them to challenge the top teams in the world to win the world championship.

name: Ilya Muromec i Solovey-Razboynik
summary: Ilya Muromec i Solovey-Razboynik is a computer game in the "quest" genre. The game was developed by PIPE studio and published by 1C.

name: I Love Finding Furbabies: Collector's Edition
summary: Collect cute furry creatures!

name: Illumination
summary: In the dense forest, there are endless mysteries.

name: I Love Softball
summary:
The object is to win the championship using female softball players. Players must choose between the six major high schools from all of the regions of Japan.

After winning the Japanese high school championship, the player must take on the American women's softball team before becoming a professional softball player.

If the player loses one game, play starts over unless the player uses a password to return to the previous round. The game's password feature allows games to be replayed and maintains total memory of which teams have already been defeated. However, the passwords and long and very difficult to remember.

name: I Love Hue Too
summary: A mind-bending color adventure. I Love Hue Too is a psychedelic journey into color, light and shape. As in the first game, players arrange colored mosaic tiles to create perfectly ordered spectrums. However, I Love Hue Too includes over thirty brand new geometric tiling patterns to create mind-bending challenges that test the player's color perception and logic even further.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: CG-4A Collector Plane
summary: Military gliders, as a mass phenomenon, belong almost entirely to the World War II era.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Flying Circus - Volume III
summary: Flying Circus: Volume III expands the WWI aerial lineup to the early war period, when the war in the skies was even more novel and precarious and the flying machine designs were sometimes built with audacity and blind luck rather than engineering thought.

name: IllusionCircle
summary: IllusionCircle is a unique and very interesting game, and you will be deeply shocked by it.Make you believe that the world is not real. You will find it very difficult to get a higher score. You need to challenge your limits.It's a good choice to give it as a gift to your friends this Christmas.

name: I'll Invaligate your Aid
summary: A short game where the antagonist is a lovely girl that doesn't want you to play.

name: Ilhumia
summary: Enter the world of Ilhumia only populated by pretty creatures. Build your deck and fight against other players alone or with a friend in this multiplayer card game. Collect the best creatures and dominate them all.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Havoc Over the Kuban Campaign
summary: This campaign focuses on a fictitious, but historically plausible A-20 Boston, or "Havoc" squadron flying interdiction missions against the over-extended German supply lines.

name: Ilamentia
summary: Ilamentia is a first-person actiony puzzler, featuring 96 challenging mind-bender levels. Some rooms focus on brain-melting logic, others rely on sharp reactions, but many more will test the limits of every facet of your cognitive faculties.

name: Illusion of L'Phalcia
summary:
The Sword of Amal - a treasure said to grant any wish.
The hero of the story is Ryser, and he works as a seeker with his partner, Cougar, to find the Sword of Amal.
Everyone he meets along the way each have their own thoughts about the Sword.

name: Illusion Inexistante
summary: Can I be happy?

name: I Love Potatoes
summary: I Love Potatoes is an adventure game for 7 to 77 year olds that deals with social innovation and sustainable economy issues in a slightly absurd, funny and quirky manner.

name: I Love Finding More Cats!: Collector's Edition
summary: Visit new locations, solve tricky puzzles, and play exciting mini-games! With new cute cats to find, I love finding more cats features even more classic hidden object gameplay across a wide variety of scenes with even more great mini-games to enjoy.

name: I Love Finding Critters!: Collector's Edition
summary:
The Collector’s Edition includes:
- 6 extra locations: find even more critters!
- 12 additional minigames
- Downloadable wallpapers and music player
- Meet the developers' adorable critters!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Ice Ring Campaign
summary: This historical campaign is dedicated to the Soviet ground attack aviation regiments during one of the most intense episodes of the Battle of Stalingrad in December 1942.

name: Illuminate
summary: Illuminate is an immersive 2D platformer where one plays as a lightbulb who must endure a journey through the streets of the Mission District. Throughout the game the lightbulb is following his family's trail, who have disappeared from Mission District due to displacement.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - La-5FN series 2 Collector Plane
summary: The La-5FN was used by many famous Soviet air regiments and many famous pilots, including the most successful Allied ace, triple Hero of the Soviet Union Ivan Kozhedub.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Polikarpov U-2VS
summary: During WWII, U-2VS was mainly used as a low-altitude bomber and recon plane. It was a very hard target for enemy fighters at low altitudes because of its low speed, resulting in its relatively high survivability rate. It was used by the famous "night witches", female pilots and navigators of 46th Guards night bomber regiment.

name: Ilavath: Battle Arenas
summary: ILAVATH, is a Team Based Strategy game that draws inspiration ancient legends of India. The war for Amruth (Elixir of Immortaility) has disturbed the cosmic balance. To restore balance, the tri-gods created Ilavath, a realm where heroes from all races battle for Moksha.

name: Illusia
summary: A classical role-playing game with casual graphics in anime style. Your task is to solve all secrets of a tower "ILLUSIA". Pass quests, fill up the arms and break through all barriers separating you from the secrets of a mysterious tower, which nobody managed to visit. Destroy the evil and preserve good in your travel to restore peace to Aztaran land. You are expected by 7 colorful levels, some game modes, 14 classes of soldiers for pumping and each of them has his unique passive and active skills and also a huge number of weapon and armor, which you can receive on a course of performance of missions, each of which is possible to modernize.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Sky Nomads Campaign
summary: Sky Nomads continues the story of the Soviet fighter pilot you may know from the Blazing Steppe campaign.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Hell Hawks Over the Bulge Campaign
summary: History books called them the "Hell Hawks", the USAAF called them as the 365th Fighter Group, the Germans called them a terror.

name: Illusion Box
summary: "Illusion Box" is the first virtual reality entertainment project of the 21st century. However, malicious rumors and computer virus infections forced the company to shut down the project. Now, the long-abandoned "Illusion Box" devices are being reactivated...

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Lisunov Li-2 Collector Plane
summary: Li-2 was a Soviet C-47 sibling armed to the teeth.

name: I'll be your ideal lover! My Dream Lover
summary: A love battle where the ideals of the protagonist & the heroines clash!

name: Ilum
summary: Action open-world game that includes elements of exploration. Taking place in ancient Babylon and the surrounding region, including cities like Borsippa, Sippar, Kutha and Kish, among others. The year is 539 BC, the time when the Babylonian empire feel to the Persians and its Jewish captives released from servitude after 70 years. As prophesied, Babylon is to be destroyed. Ilum accurately depicts archaeological findings and cuneiform inscriptions from buildings such as the Tower of Babel, Hanging Gardens and Nebuchadnezzar's palaces. Voice-acted in Akkadian language in a Biblical and Babylonian mythological background.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Bf 109 G-6 Collector Plane
summary: The Bf 109 G-6 was the most produced Messerschmitt 109 model during the war with over 12,000 aircraft in total being built once production began in February 1943.

name: I Love Food
summary:
Play as a hungry seagull and uncover tantalizing culinary creations across dozens of puzzle stages, each with unique layouts and some light platforming for our fearless fowl to navigate! Grab your ball and throw it at the stacks above you.

If you match 3 or more, the connected orbs will come tumbling down to reveal a part of the image beneath. Be careful, though! The ceiling slowly creeps downward, threatening to crush you under the remaining orbs if you’re not fast enough.

name: I Love Beauty: Hollywood Makeover
summary: In I Love Beauty: Hollywood Makeover players style the stars as they select the most stunning outfits, accessories, and the perfect makeup for all of the glamorous events around Hollywood. With 36 different cosmetics to mix and match in more than 60 variations, I Love Beauty: Hollywood Makeover will test the "fashion eye" of even the most creative stylist and is just the thing for girls who like to have fun and look their best.

name: Ill Ness
summary: "Ill Ness" was inspired by Stephen King’s science fiction horror novel called Dreamcatcher.
